TopicTitle: [1.1.2] KSPRC - Renaissance Compilation: artworks remake [V-0.7 Pre Release 3]

Articles.Content: Just wait for the update (EVE mod is still in dev). The wait will be worth. Believe me.
Is EVE even still in development? It has not been updated in quite a while. It is working just fine in .90 for me though.
Excellent work on this mod. I don't suppose you can separate the mods, so that we can download only certain parts of the mod if we want to? Like the glass texture for the Kerbals or the music?

Is EVE even still in development? It has not been updated in quite a while. It is working just fine in .90 for me though.

EVE has 2 different threads, 1 a development one (which Proot is talking about that adds a TON of nice stuff) and the 1 that has been released for some time.

Excellent work on this mod. I don't suppose you can separate the mods, so that we can download only certain parts of the mod if we want to? Like the glass texture for the Kerbals or the music?

All the stuff inside the install package is separated out by required mod. You should be able to figure it out from there.

Also, there isn't any music in the newest release...Proot has still not (and likely won't until he's done with his .90 version) released any of the "Extras" that he was talking about like Music, extra Chatterer stuff, etc..

He did release some of that with the initial Renaissance Compilation, if you can find an old download link.
can't wait till this gets updated! I love this pack!

http://i.imgur.com/cXfKK4O.png

Is that a tornado on Eve?!?!

Is that a tornado on Eve?!?!

Yup. I'm also working with coronal ejections in kerbol and some other new cool things...

Yup. I'm also working with coronal ejections in kerbol and some other new cool things...

Wow Proot, you Sir are a master of the visual enhancement!
Can't wait!

Yup. I'm also working with coronal ejections in kerbol and some other new cool things...

O.O. Make some geysers on Eeloo, please...

O.O. Make some geysers on Eeloo, please...

It's done. (was another little surprise)

Plus, I'm requesting to Rbray for the possibility of a way to create rays.

Edited December 31, 2014 by Proot

It's done. (was another little surprise)

Plus, I'm requesting to Rbray for the possibility of a way to create rays.

Yay. This will be the best mod ever man.

Could you possibly make some clouds for Kopernicus planets?
I'm wondering if such weather phenomena could be tied to a mod like Kerbal Weather Systems. KWS is looking pretty cool.

Yay. This will be the best mod ever man.

Could you possibly make some clouds for Kopernicus planets?

That'd be your job. He can't just make custom textures for everyone, and if you can't texture just go to SpaceEngine and export a cloud texture.

I'm wondering if such weather phenomena could be tied to a mod like Kerbal Weather Systems. KWS is looking pretty cool.

None of this new particle effects, among much more things, can be done in the old Eve system. Imho, the author of KWS should have supported to Rbray in the development of EVE, instead of doing a fork.

Yay. This will be the best mod ever man.

Could you possibly make some clouds for Kopernicus planets?

I'm afraid that I'm busy enough with this... Any new (environmental) proyect would be probably to RSS, but for the moment pingopete is doing a great, great work there, so don't expect any related.

And well.. We are very close to 2015 over here... We made it, we reach the future! Happy New Year to everyone!
Happy new year Proot!
Great shot proot!
